title: Zoo
creator_credit: Gerry Hudson, Ross Campbell and Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre
brief_description: This film was made at the Melbourne Zoo and, without commentary, shows the activities - particularly eating - of birds in the air and animals on land and in water. There are some interesting close-ups of parts of animals, eg. the texture of the skin of a hippo and the back of an eagle.
